text: Hubert Hajm (7 August 1914 - 1971) was a Slovenian alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics, representing Yugoslavia. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Slovenian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Yugoslavia Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Jesenice, Jesenice
title: Hubert Hajm
